Name: Ocean's Treasures
About the game: Ocean's Treasures is a VR underwater treasure hunt that places the player on the bottom of the sea to explore shipwrecks and recover lost treasures. Within 12 different scenes, you will be surrounded by some spectacular environment and fishes. You will be equipped with a metal detector, this will help you find and recover the lost items. This experience uses teleportation as locomotion to prevent motion sickness. Each scene has 10 different artifacts that need to be found before exploring the next environment. The Captain of the ship will give you all the instruction that you will need to know. You can press on your keyboard F1 to F12 for directly access those levels. F1 = Easter Island dive. F2 = Pirates shipwreck dive. F3 = Lake Mitch dive. F4 = The Swamp dive. F5 = The Dump dive. F6 = The Coral dive. F7 = Piranha cave dive. F8 = Lost Roman City dive. F9 = Lost Temple dive. F10 = The Deep dive. F11 = Bermuda Triangle dive. F12 = WW2 Wreck dive. Get ready to explore and recover the lost treasures of the sea.
